name: Don Diego - Aniversario - Robusto
additionalNotes: Don Diego Aniversario is a special full-body cigar created to celebrate the brand's 40th anniversary. Handcrafted at the famous Tabacalera de García, the world’s largest premium cigar factory. Moreover, introduced by the Menéndez and García families, founders of Montecristo, Don Diego's now blended by the legendary Grupo de Maestros. Don Diego Aniversario Robusto cigars mold from a unique blend of selected full-bodied tobaccos that have been aged for 3 years. Masterfully crafted and blended in the Dominican Republic with a flawless Sumatra wrapper from Ecuador, especially aged, hand-selected Connecticut Broadleaf binder plus Dominican, Peruvian, and Nicaraguan filler tobacco. His beautiful coffee-colored handmade cigar is full in body. It has a toasty aroma and strong leathery flavors. The finish is long and has a hint of spice.
